name: Knights of Xentar
description:
Knights of Xentar / Dragon Knight III (ドラゴンナイトIII) is a RPG video game published by Elf, MegaTech Software released on 1994 for MS-DOS.
KNIGHTS OF XENTAR Plunge into Dessasild's latest adventure in search of the Falcon Sword, aided by Rolf, a fearless dragon knight and Luna, the beautiful sorceress.
